text: Alikho icala kuwona (amakhosikazi kamphrofethi) kobaba bawo nasemadodaneni awo nakubafowabo nasemadodaneni abafowabo nasemadodaneni odadewabo nabesifazane babo nakulabo abasezandleni zawo zokudla (izigqila) futhi yesabani uMvelinqangi makhosikazi kamphrofethi, ngempela uMvelinqangi ngasosonke isikhathi ungufakazi phezu kwezinto zonke
